Package com.smartnsoft.droid4me.framework

Defines some common types used throughout the library.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    BusinessObjectLifeCycle<BusinessObjectClass>
    An interface which is bound to a business object.
    DetailsProvider.ForList<BusinessObjectClass,ViewClass>  
    DetailsProvider.ForListHandler<BusinessObjectClass>
    Introduced in order to define the contract between a list view and its adapter .
    DetailsProvider.ForListView<BusinessObjectClass,ViewClass>  
    Events
    In order to provide closure events.
    Events.OnBusinessCompletion<BusinessObjectClass>  
    SmartAdapters.BusinessViewWrapperSimplified<BusinessObjectClass,ActivityClass extends android.app.Activity>
    To capture how the simplified SmartAdapters.BasisBusinessViewWrapper work.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DetailsProvider
    Introduced in order to define various contract between: a list view and its adapter, a grid view and its adapter.
    ForBusinessObjectImplementation<BusinessObjectClass>
    A basic implementation.
    SmartAdapters
    Gathers in one place some classes used by the AbstractSmartListActivity class, which handles list views.
    SmartAdapters.BasicBusinessViewWrapper<BusinessObjectClass,ActivityClass extends android.app.Activity,ViewAttributesType>
    Wraps a business object and its underlying Android View in a list or a grid, or whatever kind of Adapter.
    SmartAdapters.BasisBusinessViewHolder<BusinessObjectClass,ActivityClass extends android.app.Activity>
    This class wraps the SmartAdapters.BusinessViewWrapper when not used inside a list.
    SmartAdapters.BasisBusinessViewWrapper<BusinessObjectClass,ActivityClass extends android.app.Activity>
    The same exact purpose of its parent class, except that the ViewAttributesType type parameter is bound to the class.
    SmartAdapters.BasisSimpleBusinessViewWrapper<BusinessObjectClass,ActivityClass extends android.app.Activity>
    A basic wrapper implementation, which lets specify its SmartAdapters.BasisSimpleBusinessViewWrapper.getType(int, Object) and representation layout identifier used to inflate it.
    SmartAdapters.BusinessViewHolder<BusinessObjectClass>
    The same exact purpose of its parent class, except that the ActivityClass type parameter is bound to the actual Android built-in class.
    SmartAdapters.BusinessViewWrapper<BusinessObjectClass>
    The same exact purpose of its parent class, except that the ActivityClass type parameter is bound to the actual Android built-in class.
    SmartAdapters.BusinessViewWrapperSimplifier<BusinessObjectClass,ActivityClass extends android.app.Activity>
    An implementation which has been introduced so as to prevent from code duplication.
    SmartAdapters.SimpleBusinessViewWrapper<BusinessObjectClass>
    The same exact purpose of its parent class, except that the ActivityClass type parameter is bound to the actual Android built-in class.
    SmartAdapters.SmartListAdapter<ViewClass extends android.view.View>
    A ListView adapter, which works closely with the SmartAdapters.BusinessViewWrapper.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    SmartAdapters.ObjectEvent
    Indicates the type of action on the underlying business object.

Package com.smartnsoft.droid4me.framework Description

Defines some common types used throughout the library.
